Name: [Artifice] Top Hat of Wonders
Desc:
For the current floor, exploring an unexplored tile causes all squad members to lose <color=#CF4029>1%</color> HP.
Upon reaching the next floor, at the end of every combat, all squad members instead recover <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> HP.
Desc2: Pulling a Bangboo out of a hat everyone thinks contains a rabbit... Now that's magic!
